name: DMATCHES.WAD
description: A package of 12 different deathmatch levels, varying in weaponry, size etc. The levels are sorted by "fragginess": first are the levels containing only shotguns, catlings etc, and last are full of bfg-plasma-cyberdemon things... All the levels are made with taste, texture alignment is excellent and there's no bugs! Go fragging your friends for next month!
